item.title: Arch Linux Installation Commands

item.description:
I’m learning about Arch Linux so I can install it on a custom build desktop. I’ll do that by doing an installation using VirtualBox. It took me eight attempts to stabilize the script below. Start by downloading ISO, e.g., from this mirror in Portugal. Next open VirtualBox and create a new machine using the image. Before starting the machine, activate EFI in the motherboard settings:
